lUZBEL::

"so "asked Luzbel"if I give you my spark, you will give me power... 
when do you have my spark?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> SS:  You would have it constantly for the rest of your existance.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > lUZBEL::
> > 
> > Luzbel asked "How many time will I have power??"
> >

> > > 
> > > SS:  Maybe you haven't figured it out yet Luzbel.  I
> > > am the embodiment of the Inferno.  You get power, but
> > > I get your spark.
> > >

> > > > Luzbel:::

> > > > crave.  
> > > > > Would you deal with the Inferno to get it.
> > > > >

> > > > as it isn't beyond

> > > > > bodily changes, and he'd be SS's slave.  He could

> > > > > normal although SS wouldn't tell him that.
